(1) Talons: Make an attack against your prey
(2) Distract: Make an arcana vs. arcana attack against your prey. If successful, that creature has disadvantage on agility until the end of the next round.
(2) Primal Protection: Reduce the damage taken by you or your owner by half. You must be within 8 spaces of your owner.
